summary:
Body meshes spilt to 9 separate locations. 
Body&Head textures spilt to 11 separate locations. 
5 child races made playable and semi customisable at character creation. 
Headgear of all types allow Circlets to be worn underneath. 
Almost ALL non playable NPC clothing&armors made playable.
Children can use adult body&head meshes&textures.
ETC.
descriptionHtml:
---------------
---------------
[color=yellow][size=3]FEATURES:[/size][/color]
CustomBody (Both Versions)
- ALL Female Humanoid Races use their own Body&Head meshes and textures sets.
- ALL Males, Orcs, Argonians and Khajiits still use the default set.
- NEW RACES: Breton Child, Breton Child Vampire, Imperial Child, Nord Child & Redguard Child.
- ALL Child Races playable, killable and semi customisable at creation.
- Adult Body Kids version of CustomBody: Allows the female children to use their own set of Body&Head meshes.
- Adult Body Kids version of CustomBody: Makes male children use the default adult male\'s set of Body&Head meshes&textures.
- ALL Adult Humanoid Races can wear children\'s clothes. (possible clipping&invisible bodyparts on Vanilla Body Kids version of CustomBody)
CustomArmor
- ALL non playable NPC clothing & armors made playable. (a few without models for females where left out)
- ALL Hats, Cowls Hoods & Helms allow Circlets to be worn under them.
- ALL armor&clothing&accessories not displaying on Vampires&Elves, now display properly. (previously were invisible when worn)
- ALL armor&clothing&accessories display on Children. (previously were invisible when worn)
---------------
---------------
[color=red][size=3]KNOWN PROBLEMS&SOLUTIONS[/size][/color]
1. NPC Child\'s head skintone is lighter then body. (Adult Body Kids version of CustomBody)
- FIXED, get this FaceGenData for [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?1b7gm4z462goq1a]Adult Body Kids version of CustomBody-v009.7z[/url]
~ Would like to thank Apachii, for posting the tutorial on his SkyHair mod page.
2. NPC\'s suffer Invisible Body Part Incidents. (CustomArmor)
- FIXED, assumed to be as of version 008
- Caused by clothing models that do not have the required cover for their assigned body areas.
~ If you find any NPCs with this problem, let me know. Also, providing the NPC\'s name will help me fix them faster. 
3. Children running around buck naked wearing only their shoes. (CustomBody)
- FIXED as of CustomBody version 009.
---------------
---------------
[color=green][size=3]INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:[/size][/color]

[color=green]1. Get the latest version of dreamtourist\'s Body by Race.7z[/color]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?1dr4rmtqib6zfby]dreamtourist\'s Body by Race Bv09&Av10-withVBK.7z[/url]
[color=green]2. Copy&Paste the version of CustomBody you want to use into the game\'s Data folder.[/color]
CustomBody.esp (Vanilla Body Kids)
UPDATED: current version v009, new version. 
CustomBody.esp (Adult Body Kids)
UPDATED: current version v009, permanantly killed the child nudity bug. 
[color=green]3. Copy&Paste CustomArmor into the game\'s Data folder.[/color]
CustomArmor.esp
UPDATED: current version 010, readded ALL Helms, Hats, Cowls and Hoods made to be wearable with circlets. 
---------------
[color=green]4.METHOD A - Manual.[/color]
Dummy Data Folder
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zdy444rbzh445ar]Dummy Data Folder[/url]

- Unzip the Dummy Data Folder archive somewhere temporary. 
- Use it to learn where the meshes&textures go for each Race. 
- Download all the Body mods you want to use and remember to get their matching Face/Hand mods.
- Place the meshes&textures of the Body you want for the Race into it\'s folder in the Dummy Data Folder, replacing the matching txt files.
- You will have to replace all of the txt files, before you Copy&Paste the meshes & textures folders into your game\'s Data folder.
- Customize to suite your tastes.

[color=green]4.METHOD B - Easy.[/color]
Caliente&Bella Default Bundle for dreamtourist\'s Body by Race.7z
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?d3pjj82ifogmt63]Caliente&Bella Default Bundle for dreamtourist\'s Body by Race.7z[/url]
- Use the link to get my custom made Set, using Caliente\'s & Bella\'s mods. Caliente and Bella have given their permissions for the continued use of this bundled 

set. If your new to their work, you should have a look at their mods on the Nexus.
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812]Better Females by Bella[/url]
---------------
[color=green]*5.Children\'s Clothes Replacers. (ONLY for Adult Body Kids version of CustomBody)[/color]
- Get 1 set for Female children & 1 set for male children.
- Extract the contents of the archives into the game\'s Data folder. 
- You can also use some other clothing to replace it by refering to the New Location section.
 
Female Children\'s Clothes-REQUIRES CustomBody esp.7z
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?6l39rol54s6oz7k]Female Children\'s Clothes-REQUIRES CustomBody esp.7z[/url]
-alternate replacer set for female children\'s clothing&shoes.
[color=blue]New Location of the Meshes used by Children\'s Clothes for Females[/color]
[size=1]meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\1stpersonPrints_0.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\1stpersonPrints_1.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\RedflowerPrints_0.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\RedflowerPrints_1.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\WhiteHeels_0.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\WhiteHeels_1.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\TigerPrintsBikini_0.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\TigerPrintsBikini_1.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\TigerPrintsJeans_0.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\TigerPrintsJeans_1.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\BlackHeels_0.nif
meshes\\clothes\\childrenclothes\\f\\BlackHeels_1.nif[/size]

Male Children\'s Clothes-REQUIRES CustomBody esp.7z
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?8rqkqszjrg5x9sa]Male Children\'s Clothes-REQUIRES CustomBody esp.7z[/url]
-Required to replace the vanilla versions of the Male children\'s clothing&shoes.
-Not using this will result in shotas with disembodied hands&heads in your Skyrim.
[color=blue]New Location of the Meshes used by Children\'s Clothes for Males[/color]
[size=1]Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Torso01_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Torso01_1.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\1stPersonTorso01_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\1stPersonTorso01_1.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Torso02_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Torso02_1.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\1stPersonTorso02_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\1stPersonTorso02_1.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Torso03_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Torso03_1.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\1stPersonTorso03_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\1stPersonTorso03_1.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Shoes01_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Shoes01_1.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Shoes02_0.nif
Clothes\\ChildrenClothes\\M\\Shoes02_1.nif[/size]
---------------
[color=green]6.Load Order:[/color]
CustomBody.esp
CustomArmor.esp
---------------
---------------
[color=blue][size=3]FOLDER LAYOUT provided for meshes&textures customization.[/size][/color]
1. The Mesh files:
1stpersonfemalehands_0.nif
1stpersonfemalehands_1.nif
femalebody_0.nif
femalebody_1.nif
femalefeet_0.nif
femalefeet_1.nif
femalehands_0.nif
femalehands_1.nif

2. The Mesh folders by Race:
Folder used by ALL Males and ALL Orcs, Argonians, Khajiits & ALL their vampire counterparts. (Also used by Adult Body Male Children & their Vampire Variants)
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\
Folder used by Female Breton & Female Breton Vampires.
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\Breton\\
Folder used by Female Dark Elf & Female Dark Elf Vampires.
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\Dark Elf\\
Folder used by Female High Elf & Female High Elf Vampires.
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\High Elf\\
Folder used by Female Imperial & Female Imperial Vampires.
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\Imperial\\
Folder used by Female Nord & Female Nord Vampires.
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\Nord\\
Folder used by Female Redguard & Female Redguard Vampires.
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\Redguard\\
Folder used by Female Wood Elf & Female Wood Elf Vampires.
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\Wood Elf\\
Folder used by Female Child & Female Child Vampires. (only for Adult Body Kids version of CustomBody)
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\Child\\

3. The Texture files:
Female
femalebody_1.dds
femalebody_1_msn.dds
femalebody_1_s.dds
femalebody_1_sk.dds
femalehands_1.dds
femalehands_1_msn.dds
femalehands_1_s.dds
femalehead.dds
femalehead_msn.dds
femalehead_s.dds
Male
malebody_1.dds
malebody_1_msn.dds
malebody_1_s.dds
malebody_1_sk.dds
malehands_1.dds
malehands_1_msn.dds
malehands_1_s.dds
malehead.dds
malehead_msn.dds
malehead_s.dds

4. The Texture folders by Race:
Folder used by ALL Males and ALL Orcs, Argonians, Khajiits & ALL their vampire counterparts. (Also used by Adult Body Male Children & their Vampire Variants)
- textures\\actors\\character\\male\\
+ Except for the races that need their femalehead_msn.dds file, to be placed in separate folders.
-- textures\\actors\\character\\bretonmale\\
-- textures\\actors\\character\\darkelfmale\\
-- textures\\actors\\character\\highelfmale\\
-- textures\\actors\\character\\imperialmale\\
-- textures\\actors\\character\\redguardmale\\
Folder used by Female Breton & Female Breton Vampires.
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\breton\\
+ Place their femalehead_msn.dds file here.
-- textures\\actors\\character\\bretonfemale\\
Folder used by Female Dark Elf & Female Dark Elf Vampires.
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\dark elf\\
+ Place their femalehead_msn.dds file here.
-- textures\\actors\\character\\darkelffemale\\
Folder used by Female High Elf & Female High Elf Vampires.
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\high elf\\
+ Place their femalehead_msn.dds file here.
-- textures\\actors\\character\\highelffemale\\
Folder used by Female Imperial & Female Imperial Vampires.
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\imperial\\
+ Place their femalehead_msn.dds file here.
-- textures\\actors\\character\\imperialfemale\\
Folder used by Female Nord & Female Nord Vampires.
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\
Folder used by Female Redguard & Female Redguard Vampires.
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\redguard\\
+ Place their femalehead_msn.dds file here.
-- textures\\actors\\character\\redguardfemale\\
Folder used by Female Wood Elf & Female Wood Elf Vampires.
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\wood elf\\
Folder used by Female Child & Female Child Vampires. (only for Adult Body Kids version of CustomBody)
- textures\\actors\\character\\female\\child\\
---------------
---------------



Thank you,
Caliente
Bella
